titles.title: Praise Waiteth For Thee, O Lord, Praise Waiteth For Thee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I will magnify Thee, O Lord,
I will magnify Thee.
I will magnify Thee, O Lord,
Magnify Thee in Zion.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Praise waiteth for Thee, O Lord,
Praise waiteth for Thee.
Praise waiteth for Thee, O Lord,
Waiteth for Thee in Zion.
